request.description: Implement remaining P2/P3 orchestration enhancements from PLAN_ORCHESTRATION_ENHANCEMENTS_20251208: (1) Parallel Execution Engine - automated parallel agent spawning with dispatch instructions, (2) Real-Time Dashboard - terminal UI with blessed for monitoring agents, tokens, and progress. Build on existing P1 work in IMPL_ORCHESTRATION_ENHANCEMENTS_P1_20251208.
